question: What are the names of mentioned capital improvement projects? Return None if no answer is found.
sub_query_list: names of mentioned capital improvement projects
sub_answers: The mentioned capital improvement projects are the Marie Canyon Green Streets, Malibu Park Drainage Improvements, City Hall Roof Replacement, Annual Street Maintenance, Bluffs Park Shade Structure, Broad Beach Road Water Quality Infrastructure Repairs, Latigo Canyon Road Roadway/Retaining Wall Improvements, Trancas Canyon Park Planting and Irrigation Repairs, PCH Median Improvements Project, and PCH Signal Synchronization System Improvements Project.
final_answer: The mentioned capital improvement projects are the Marie Canyon Green Streets, Malibu Park Drainage Improvements, City Hall Roof Replacement, Annual Street Maintenance, Bluffs Park Shade Structure, Broad Beach Road Water Quality Infrastructure Repairs, Latigo Canyon Road Roadway/Retaining Wall Improvements, Trancas Canyon Park Planting and Irrigation Repairs, PCH Median Improvements Project, and PCH Signal Synchronization System Improvements Project.

Public Works Commission
Agenda Report

Public Works
Commission Meeting
03-02-21
Item
4.A.

To:

Chair Merrick and Members of the Public Works Commission

Prepared by:

Robert DuBoux, Public Works Director/City Engineer

Date prepared: February 18, 2021

Meeting date: March 2, 2021

Subject:

Capital Improvement Projects and Disaster Recovery Projects Status
Report

RECOMMENDED ACTION: Receive and file report on the status of the City’s current and
upcoming Capital Improvements Projects and Disaster Recovery Projects.

DISCUSSION: Staff will provide a status update on the following active projects in the
Fiscal Year 2020-2021 Capital Improvement Program:

Capital Improvement Projects (Design)

Marie Canyon Green Streets
(cid:190) Updates:

(cid:131) The City has recently received Measure W funds to complete this
project. Staff is working on the project plans to prepare for public
bidding.

(cid:190) Project Schedule:

February 1, 2021.

(cid:131) The State is reviewing the City’s application for the State Revolving

Fund program.

(cid:131) The project assessment engineer has begun

the process of

evaluating the project costs.

(cid:131) Next public community meeting is scheduled for March 25th.

(cid:190) Project Schedule:

(cid:131) Complete Design: December 2021
(cid:131) Begin Construction: March 2022

Page 2 of 6

Agenda Item # 4.A.










Malibu Park Drainage Improvements

(cid:190) Updates:

(cid:131) Staff is making minor modifications to the project plans to reduce the

overall project costs.

(cid:131) Project is scheduled to go out to bid next week.

(cid:190) Project Schedule:

(cid:131) Complete Design: February 2021
(cid:131) Begin Construction: April 2021

Capital Improvement Projects (Construction)

City Hall Roof Replacement

(cid:190) Updates: The City has held project meetings with the contractor and is

developing a project schedule.

(cid:131) The contractor is also working on the curb, gutter and storm drain
installation on Civic Center Way from Webb Way to the condos. This
portion of the work may require temporary road closures. However, it
is anticipated that this phase of the project will be completed at the
end of February 2021.

(cid:190) Project Schedule: August 2020 through March 2021

Page 3 of 6

Agenda Item # 4.A.








Capital Improvement Projects (Not Started)

Annual Street Maintenance

(cid:190) Project Description: This project provides for the reconstruction and

maintenance of City streets.

(cid:190) Estimated Schedule:

(cid:131) Complete Design: Spring 2021
(cid:131) Begin Construction: Summer 2021

Bluffs Park Shade Structure

(cid:190) Project Description: This project consists of the installation of four single-

post shade structures at Malibu Bluffs Park

(cid:190) Estimated Schedule:

(cid:131) Complete Design: Summer 2021
(cid:131) Begin Construction: Fall 2021

Broad Beach Road Water Quality Infrastructure Repairs

(cid:190) Updates:

(cid:131) The project consultant has started the design of the project.

(cid:190) Project Schedule:

(cid:131) Complete Design: Summer 2021
(cid:131) Begin Construction: Fall 2021

Page 4 of 6

Agenda Item # 4.A.









Latigo Canyon Road Roadway/Retaining Wall Improvements (FEMA/CalOES Project)

(cid:190) Updates:

(cid:131) Staff is finalizing the design of this project.
(cid:131) Staff is also working with FEMA/CalOES to substitute the existing

timber with non-combustible materials.

(cid:190) Project Schedule

(cid:131) Complete Design: Spring 2021
(cid:131) Begin Construction: Summer 2021

Trancas Canyon Park Planting and Irrigation Repairs (FEMA/CalOES Project)

(cid:190) Updates:

(cid:131) The project consultant has started the design of this project.

(cid:190) Project Schedule

(cid:131) Complete Design: Summer 2021
(cid:131) Begin Construction: Summer/Fall 2021

(cid:190) Project Schedule:

(cid:131) Complete Design: April 2021
(cid:131) Begin Construction: Summer 2021

PCH Median Improvements Project

(cid:190) Updates:

(cid:131) Consultant is working on the final design. In March, the City be
to perform construction

from consultants

seeking proposals
management.

(cid:190) Project Schedule:

(cid:131) Complete Design: February 2021
(cid:131) Begin Construction: Fall 2021

Page 1 of 6

Agenda Item # 4.A.
















PCH Signal Synchronization System Improvements Project

(cid:190) Updates:

(cid:131) 65% design package was submitted to Caltrans in November 2020.
(cid:131) Consultant is working on final design documents.

(cid:190) Project Schedule:

(cid:131) Complete Final Design: May 2021
(cid:131) Advertise: July 2021
(cid:131) Award Contract and Begin Construction: September 2021

Civic Center Stormwater Diversion Structure

(cid:190) Updates:
